addBusiness.title: Faaopoopo Lau Pisinisi
addBusiness.subtitle: Lisi lau pisinisi i la matou lisi o mea e fai ina ia aapa atu ai i nisi tagata faatau

steps.basicInfoDesc: Faamatala mai ia i matou lau pisinisi
steps.contactDesc: O le auala e mafai ai e tagata faatau ona aapa atu ia te oe
steps.additionalDesc: Fesoasoani i tagata faatau ia malamalama lelei i au auaunaga

addBusiness.businessNamePlaceholder: Ta i totonu le igoa o lau pisinisi
addBusiness.businessNameDescription: O le auala lenei o le a faailoa ai e tagata faatau lau pisinisi
addBusiness.descriptionPlaceholder: Faamatala mai ia i matou lau pisinisi...
addBusiness.descriptionDescription: Tuuina atu se faamatalaga auiliili o lau pisinisi ma auaunaga
addBusiness.logoDescription: JPG, PNG po o le GIF, maualuga 2MB
addBusiness.statePlaceholder: Ta i totonu le setete po o le itumalo
addBusiness.zipCodePlaceholder: Ta i totonu le numera faalilolilo o le ZIP/meli
addBusiness.serviceInputPlaceholder: Ta i totonu se auaunaga e te ofoina atu
addBusiness.noServices: E leai ni auaunaga ua faaopoopoina i le taimi nei
addBusiness.openingHoursPlaceholder: faataitaiga, Aso Gafua-Aso Faraile: 9am-5pm, Aso Toonai: 10am-3pm
addBusiness.isFeatured: Talosaga i le Lisi o Mea o Loo Faaalia
addBusiness.featuredDescription: O lisi o loo faaalia i le pito i luga o taunuuga o sailiga (e ono faatatau i ai ni pili faaopoopo)
addBusiness.agreeToTerms: Ou te ioe i Tulafono ma Tuutuuga
addBusiness.pleaseAgreeToTerms: E tatau ona e ioe i tuutuuga ma tuutuuga e faaauau ai
addBusiness.businessUnderReview: Ua uma ona auina atu lau pisinisi ma o loo iloiloina. O le a matou faailoa atu ia te oe i le taimi lava e faamaonia ai.
addBusiness.pleaseTryAgain: Sa i ai se mea sese i le auina atu o lau pisinisi. Faamolemole toe taumafai i se taimi mulimuli ane.
